messages.title: It's a two-horse race!
messages.content: Voting Labour here will only help the Conservatives. In Carshalton & Wallington elections are always between Tom Brake's Lib Dems and the Conservatives. No other result is possible.

messages.title: Who is going to stand up for YOU?

mentions.tacticalSituation: Latest odds show Labour out of the race here: Labour 100-1

images.caption: Who is going to stand up for YOU?

leaflet.additionalNotes: Result at the last General Election - Lib 17,357, Con 16,289, Lab 7,396. Provided by Smarden 11 The Printway, Aintree Village, Unit 5g, Heysham Avenue, L9 7DB
